item.title: EP 51: Crazy Cryptid Week: Mongolian Death Worm
item.itunes:title: Crazy Cryptid Week: Mongolian Death Worm
item.description:
Today we visit the Gobi Desert in search of the Mongolian Death Worm, then take a trip to the freezing cold waters where the Titanic sunk and enjoy a screening of a Nazi version of that infamous incident.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

The Mongolian Death Worm is a creature of legend but many believes it still stalks the Gobi Desert today. Is it possible that an acid spitting, ground electrifying, massive worm is evading human capture only feet underground?

Then we get a private viewing of "Titanic." No, not the one with Leonardo DiCaprio but one made by the Nazis as a propaganda film during the height of World War 2. But just like the ship it was based on, the movie was doomed from the start.

Links:

Mongolian Death Worm

http://cryptozoologycryptids.wikia.com/wiki/Mongolian_Death_Worm

Lost Tapes Season 1 Episode 13 Death Worm

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VQKVHxDakok

Finding the Legendary Mongolian Death Worm

https://www.ancient-origins.net/myths-legends-asia/finding-legendary-mongolian-death-worm-001973

Mongolian Death Worm: Elusive Legend of the Gobi Desert

https://www.livescience.com/46450-mongolian-death-worm.html

Titanic (1943 Film)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Titanic_(1943_film)

The Strange Sinking Of The Nazi Titanic

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/culture/tvandradio/9124111/The-strange-sinking-of-the-Nazi-Titanic.html

Nazi Titanic: The Horrific True Story of the Nazis’ $180 Million Propaganda Film

https://www.thewrap.com/nazi-titanic-that-time-the-nazis-made-the-most-expensive-propaganda-film-in-history/

George Gallo At Helm Of ‘The Nazi Titanic’, Making Of Hitler & Joseph Goebbels’ Propaganda Ship Sink Disaster Epic

https://deadline.com/2018/06/nazi-titanic-movie-making-of-german-wwii-propaganda-film-george-gallo-directing-1202418411/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
